summary: SummaryDior's micellar cleansing water and makeup remover made of 98%* natural-origin ingredients to soothe and hydrate the skin while eliminating all traces of face and eye makeup.
details: DetailsBenefitsThis face cleanser is infused with hyaluronic acid, purifying French water lily and soothing cornflower floral water to effortlessly remove makeup, purify the skin and cleanse the pores while strengthening the skin barrier.Key IngredientsFrench water lily helps purify the skin.**Hyaluronic acid helps maintain skin hydration.Cornflower floral water helps soothe feelings of discomfort on the skin.Research Results*Amount calculated based on the ISO 16128-1 and ISO 16128-2 standard. Water percentage included. The remaining 2% of ingredients contribute to the formula's performance, sensory appeal and stability.**Ex vivo test on skin explant.Item 2604185How To UseApply Micellar Water with a soft cotton pad.Follow with La Mousse OFF/ON Face Cleanser.IngredientsAqua (Water), Propanediol, Glycerin, Centaurea Cyanus Flower Water, Nymphaea Alba Root Extract, Saponins, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum (Fragrance), Quillaja Saponaria Wood Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Saponaria Officinalis Leaf/Root Extract, Citric Acid, Tocopherol, Butylene Glycol, Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Caprylyl Glycol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply Micellar Water with a soft cotton pad.Follow with La Mousse OFF/ON Face Cleanser.

reviews.headline: Best water cleanser ever omg
reviews.comments: This took my mascara off in literally like 30 seconds and i usally have to scrub and wipe aggressively at my eyelashes for 4 minutes to get all of it off . It melted all of my mascara under a minute.

reviews.headline: My review
reviews.comments: Works beautifully on skin but is WAYY overpriced

faceoff_positive.comments: I have very oily skin, so for decades I have done in-between cleansing during the day, and cleansing water does the best job of controlling shine without stripping the skin. This one works very well and is a pleasure to use; I don't wear makeup, but I'm sure it works equally well as a makeup remover.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great for In-Between Cleansing

faceoff_negative.comments: Just ok but I expected better from Dior. Would not buy again sorry.
faceoff_negative.headline: Just ok
